# README #

Multiple tools to speed up dev.
Wrapper for all.


-----

Install C++ build tool
https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/downloads/
  
  
On Linux or macOS:
    pip install -U pip

On Windows:  
    python -m pip install -U pip
        
On Mac, need to enable 
    xcode-select --install          to import setuptools success.
